description:
A rich lady who owned a female Meowth called Meowzie that she pampered and even bought a diamond encrusted Pok√©ball for.
She was a stuck up lady and even struck Team Rocket`s Meowth (which was then a street cat) with her umbrella because it was attempting to with her Meowzie over.
However, after losing her fortune, she abandoned her pet Meowth and left it to roam the street.
name: Meowzie Owner
